title: Betty: a shop steward

abstract: Episode following 'Betty' in her role as a shop steward aiming to improve conditions for factory workers.
description: Episode of Series "Our multicultural society". Betty, from a Scottish working-class background, is a shop steward who plays a strong role in improving conditions at the factory in which she works. Intended to look critically and personally at the stereotype of the "pommy troublemaker" unionist, the film also raises other questions about working women.
